ygData.subject: RE: Carillion song (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wondering what race/class Tszaaz is? I wouldn t think any wood elf, human, or half elf bard would have to worry about being KOS in Highpass? Did you do
ygData.messageBody:
Just wondering what race/class Tszaaz is? I wouldn't think any wood elf,
human, or half elf bard would have to worry about being KOS in Highpass?
Did you do something in Highpass to hurt your faction?

Galtin of E'ci

> *laughs* oh that is EXACTLY what I am saying...um, or not. I am willing to
> bet you couldn't charisma them out of KoS. it took a lot of gnoll killing
> before I could get the Highpass guards to like me enough to GIVE them a
> gnoll skin.
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
>
>
